record.dc:title: 68GP22, 15GP22, Greenup County, Kentucky. Hardin Village. Feature 28, Head of Antecedent Drain.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: View of Feature 28, head of antecedent drain, similar to Feature 19, partially exposed. Head of antecedent drain, filled with black, humitic soil, much bone, mussel shell and other midden material. Drain continues to river bank, exactly like Feature 19.
record.wpa:comments: More information, including diagram, available at institution. F.S. #'s associated with Feature available.
